alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Gentry; Harrison; Holt; Mercer; Nodaway; Putnam; Schuyler; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 10:54AM CDT until April 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Warm, dry, and windy conditions continue today. Relative humidity will be around 25 percent this afternoon in northeast Kansas and northwest Missouri with wind gusts upwards of 30 MPH. Burning is discouraged today throughout the region. Thursday, more of the same conditions are expected.... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR |WARM, DRY, AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 003, 004, 005, 006, 007, 008, AND 011... The National Weather Service in Kansas City/Pleasant Hill has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 8 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 001, 002, 003, 004, 005, 006, 007, 008, and 011. * WIND...Out of the southwest at 20 to 30 mph, with gusts upwards of 30 MPH. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity 20 to 25 percent this afternoon/ * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Atchison; Gentry; Harrison; Holt; Mercer; Nodaway; Putnam; Schuyler; Worth
